Import Proc
Here I am importing a dataset

```{r}
library(haven)
airline <- read_sas("http://www.principlesofeconometrics.com/sas/airline.sas7bdat", 
    NULL)

airline
```

Data Viz
```{r}


library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

airline %>%
 filter(Y >= 2 & Y <= 23.8) %>%
 filter(W >= 0.36 & W <= 1.78) %>%
 filter(R >= 
    0.155 & R <= 0.59) %>%
 filter(L >= 1.75 & L <= 6.9) %>%
 filter(K >= 1.1 & K <= 
    9.6) %>%
 ggplot() +
 aes(x = W, y = Y, colour = YEAR) +
 geom_point(size = 1L) +
 scale_color_gradient() +
 theme_minimal()

```
